pullrequest.title: Attach model plugins to corresponding models in the world tab

content.raw: One last thing, have you considered adding a test to `ModelListWidget_TEST` for the plugins? A simplified version of [ModelListWidget_TEST::LinkProperties](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e071428f4891f02ff95188d6089a246d2aa0cc8b/gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelListWidget_TEST.cc-628) loading `world/underwater.world` and checking the buoyancy plugin properties should be enough, does that sound doable?
content.html: One last thing, have you considered adding a test to ModelListWidget_TEST for the plugins? A simplified version of ModelListWidget_TEST::LinkProperties loading world/underwater.world and checking the buoyancy plugin properties should be enough, does that sound doable?
